enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: On 15 December, the COP elected officers other than the President.

The COP Vice-Presidents are Mohammed Barkindo (Nigeria), Feturi Elisaia (Samoa), Christiana Figueres-Olsen (Costa Rica), Eric Mugurusi (Tanzania), Alexander Pankin (Russian Federation), Marina Shvangiradze (Georgia), and Traude Wollansky (Austria).
Karen Nicole Smith (Barbados) was elected as COP Rapporteur.
Bagher Asadi (Iran) was re-elected Chair of SBI, and Helen Plume (New Zealand) was elected as SBSTA Chair.
